  • Uses of Ray in cs3318.group17.raytracer

    Fields in cs3318.group17.raytracer declared as Ray
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final Ray
    RayHit.ray
     
    Methods in cs3318.group17.raytracer that return Ray
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Ray
    RayHit.getReflectionRay()
    If a Shape is reflective then light Rays incident upon it are reflected such that the angle of reflection between the reflected Ray and the normal to the surface at the Point of reflection is equal to the angle of incidence between the incident Ray and the normal to the surface at the Point of reflection.
    Ray
    RayHit.getTransmissionRay()
    If a Shape is transparent then light Rays incident upon it are not reflected but are instead refracted.
    Methods in cs3318.group17.raytracer with parameters of type Ray

    RayTracer.trace(Ray ray, int depth)
     
    Constructors in cs3318.group17.raytracer with parameters of type Ray
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    RayHit(Ray ray, Shape shape, Vector normal, double t, boolean entering)
    RayHit is a class which computes and then stores all the information produced when a Ray is incident upon a Shape including: the references to which Ray and Shape are involved in the intersection, the Point of incidence, the normal to the surface of Shape at the Point of incidence, the length along the Ray at which the Point of incidence occurs and whether the Ray is entering or exiting the Shape if that shape is transparent.
     
    RayHit(Ray ray, Shape shape, Vector normal, Point intersection, boolean entering)
    Same as RayHit(Ray, Shape, Vector, double, boolean) but Point of intersection is given and length t along ray is computed instead.

  • Uses of Ray in cs3318.group17.raytracer.scene

    Methods in cs3318.group17.raytracer.scene that return Ray
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Ray
    Camera.getRay(int col, int row)
    Returns the Ray which originates from the eye and passes through the centre of the square located at the col-th column of the row-th row of the window screen grid.
    Ray
    Camera.getRay(int col, int row, double pixelAdjustmentX, double pixelAdjustmentY)
    Returns the ray which passes through the center of the square on the window screen grid located in the col-th column of the row-th row of the window screen grid.
    Methods in cs3318.group17.raytracer.scene with parameters of type Ray
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Color
    AmbientLight.getColor(RayHit hit, Ray lightRay)
    Returns an amplified version of the color seen on the surface hit by the ambient light ray.
    Color
    Light.getColor(RayHit hit, Ray lightRay)
    Returns the diffused and specular color seen on the surface hit by the light ray.
